author: John H. Cox

review: Love it! I have two TVs. One upstairs and one downstairs, and I can move it between both without any reconfiguring. Actually, I'm on here to purchase a second one for my "smart" TV because I like the streaming shows and capabilities of the Fire Stick way better than my TV's built-in streaming function. I'm sort of shocked by all of the bad reviews. My router is downstairs, and my upstairs TV streams just as well as the TV that is nearer the router. It installed easily and flawlessly on both TVs. I love the simplicity of the little remote. I'm a very happy customer!
author: unsatisfied scientist

review: Junk. Just received this and it will not connect to our WiFi. We've tried several times over the course of 2 weeks with no success. We've done every single thing in the troubleshooting section to remedy this and it still won't connect. Our router is about 12 feet away. And it has nothing to do with the number of devices on our network since this is simply replacing our Google Chromecast. I guess we're plugging the Chromecast back in. Sorry Amazon-maybe I got a dud but first impressions stick with me. Giving 1 star b/c I have no option to give zero stars.

review: Oh my gosh - it EXCEEDED our expectations.  We had Chromecast and my husband had no interest in it whatsoever.  However, when the Fire TV Stick arrived and I showed him all that was on it, he commented, please leave that little remote where I can find it.  I guess he's as hooked on Amazon Fire TV Stick as I am!  Bravo, Amazon, once again!!!
